underlying_goal: Summarize a Medium article about giving Claude Code superpowers and create a structured Obsidian note with translation to Korean
friction_detail: Playwright tool was requested but unavailable, and Medium blocked direct access via WebFetch, requiring fallback to web search for content gathering.
brief_summary: User asked to summarize a Medium article into an Obsidian note using Playwright; Claude couldn't use Playwright but worked around Medium's access restrictions via web search and created the document.
